title: Mondays With Mike: March 2015 Edition
teaser: Public broadcasting is facing significant cuts under Gov. Scott Walker’s proposed budget. In this special edition of Mondays with Mike, Joy Cardin and WPR Director Mike Crane welcome the heads that oversee Wisconsin’s public broadcasting operations. They’ll discuss the latest on how the reduced funding would affect WPR, Wisconsin Public Television and more.
